venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
I thought we could see the movie Drillbit Taylor this month.

Finally the Blacstone valley posted the time for Friday!
Movie time is 7:35.
Let's meet at the piano in the main entrance at between 7:15 - 7:25
If anyone feels like grabbing dinner before the movie call me, there's a bunch of places to eat.
Phone # is (508)212-4111
Mark

Don't forget. For the first 7 MEMBERS That show up can buy a ticket from me for $8.00!*
*(only those that RSVP'd YES)
The regular price for a ticket is $10.25

If you can't make it PLEASE call me or change your RSVP before 5pm
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the front entrance near the piano
item.name: Friday Night Movie! Drillbit Taylor
